content.p: Use the search function below to filter our list of research experts by name, discipline, research theme or topic to view a brief summary of their research and a selection of their recent articles. Associate Professor of Human Trafficking and Modern Slavery Professor of Creative and Cultural Industries Professor of Economics Assistant Professor in Tourism & the Environment Associate Professor in Financial Economics Associate Professor in Political Theory Professor of Earth and Environmental Dynamics Assistant Professor in Economic Geography Professor of Entrepreneurship and Innovation Associate Professor of Hydroinformatics Professor of Industrial Economics Professor of Sustainable Business and Development Associate Professor in Entrepreneurship and Innovation Professor of International Human Rights Law and Co-Director of the Human Rights Law Centre Assistant Professor in Climate Change Assistant Professor in Applied Psychology Assistant Professor in Sustainable Business and Business Ethics Associate Professor in Environmental Change Assistant Professor in Law Assistant Professor Research Fellow in Social-Ecological Systems Modelling Associate Professor of Earth System Science Associate Professor Associate Professor in the School of Psychology Professor of Education Socio-ecological and intersectional justice; Critical Sustainability and Global Citizenship Education; Critical Development Studies; Decolonial thought; Indigeneity and Ubuntu; Critical Mathematics and STEM Education; political ecology.
